name: spin-protocol-admin-tool
description: Admin tool for SpinProtocol's decentralized environment

scripts.buildRun-dev: export NODE_ENV=development && npm run bundle-dev && npm start
scripts.buildRun-prod: export NODE_ENV=production && npm run bundle-prod && npm start
scripts.bundle-dev: browserify --debug 'src/index.js' -t [ babelify --presets [ env stage-0 react ] --plugins [transform-async-to-generator transform-runtime] ] -o 'dist/bundle.js' -v
scripts.bundle-prod: browserify 'src/index.js' -t [ babelify --presets [ env stage-0 react ] --plugins [transform-async-to-generator transform-runtime] ] -o 'dist/bundle.js' -v

author: Mustafa Morca
